tool_description: WebSecurityGuard is a sophisticated .NET Core API designed to protect users and organizations from falling victim to phishing attacks. With the rise of cyber threats, particularly phishing attempts aimed at stealing sensitive information, having a robust defense mechanism is paramount. WebSecurityGuard offers a comprehensive solution by leveraging advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze website and detect potential phishing urls.
name: Web Security Guard
title: Web Security Guard

api_list.name: getWebsiteSecurityRank
api_list.description: The getWebsiteSecurityScans endpoint is a part of the WebsiteSecurityGuard API, which allows users to retrieve security scan results for a specific website. This endpoint enables users to obtain detailed information about the security checks performed on a given website, including the results of various security parameters such as phishing indicators, HTTPS usage, SSL certificate details, presence of broken links, and detection of suspicious keywords.
